title: Bug 18285 - Incorrect Behavior When Double-Clicking on Import Statement
description: In build 20020528, there is an issue where double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline opens the editor for the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
OB: When double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline of build 20020528, it opens the editor for the target type, not the unit hosting the import reference.
EB: The expected behavior is that double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline should open the editor for the unit hosting the import reference, not the target type itself.
SR:
To reproduce the issue in build 20020528:
1. Open the package view outline.
2. Locate a type import statement (e.g., 'import com.example.MyType;').
3. Double-click on the import statement.
Observation: The editor opens for the referenced type ('MyType') rather than the unit hosting the import reference.
